yarn ○ caterpillar color ○ chrysalis color ● polyfil ● safety eyes 12mm pattern notes ● the finished caterpillar is approximately 6 ½ long and the chrysalis is approximately 8 long when made with the recommended tools and materials ● all parts of this pattern are worked with the size g/4 25mm hook unless otherwise stated ● all parts of this pattern are worked using the yarn-over technique ●
